name: Super Hanks RPG
description:
Super Hanks RPG is a Tom Hanks-themed JRPG  for Tom Hanks Jam,  made in two weeks in RPG Maker 2003. 

https://itch.io/jam/hanks-jam

Soundtrack: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ziU1EJGGWTc

GAME AND MUSIC BY LFOB: https://twitter.com/zLFOBz

Special thanks to Thomas McTague and Summer for testing, and Sophronsine Sound Design for sea sound effects.

DISCLAIMER: Any disclaimers found within this game are to be considered a joke, unless I am going to be sued and the disclaimers create some sort of legal loophole.
